title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' functionality does not work consistently. Specifically, after creating a new file named f1.txt and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: After creating a new file named f1.txt and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all the saved files should be closed.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 2. Open multiple editors. 3. Create a new file named f1.txt. 4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
